nodes.text: Reen was a human female pilot who worked with the droid Kreven. She and Kreven were hired to transport cargo aboard the starship Trustworthy by the Guild of Technicians. Kreven betrayed her, however, and sabotaged the vessel's engines, causing the Trustworthy to crash. Reen uncovered her partner's treachery with the inadvertent help of an Ewok stowaway.
